General.Name: Taiba Holding Co.
General.Description: Taiba Investment Company invests in, buys, owns, develops, sells, leases, operates, maintains, markets, and manages real estate properties in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company also invests in, owns, operates, maintains, and manages hotels, hospitals, tourist resorts, and recreational and tourism facilities; and operates, maintains, and manages cities, and public facilities. In addition, it is involved in the architectural, civil, mechanical, and electrical contracting; and industrial and mining activities. Further, the company provides credit and mortgage services. The company was formerly known as Taiba Holding Co. and changed its name to Taiba Investment Company in May 2019. Taiba Investment Company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in AI Madinah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
